title: Slower deposit growth may create structural liquidity issues for banks, says Shaktikanta Das
description: RBI Governor expresses concerns over financial sector changes due to faster credit growth than deposit growth. Banks increasing reliance on short-term borrowings raises liquidity management challenges. Emphasis on maintaining correct valuation of liquid assets for resilience. Focus on reducing inflation to benefit rural consumption and economic stability.
